content.p: As of August 2013-14, the ECRN is currently into its third season of Brown Bag Research Seminars, and will commence its third season of Workshops and Forums in the 2013-14 Spring Semester. These two streams of events have been widely attended, providing important platforms for the sharing of research and skills amongst the UNMC Early Career Researcher population. Check out the posters below from some of our previous events on Slideshare, and get a taste of what we're all about! telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001 email: ecrn@nottingham.edu.my
